```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

df <- read.csv("~/Documents/R/scouting2026/shinyapp/data/test_data/data.csv")

select_team <- function(team_id){
    selected_team <- df |>
        filter(team %in% c(team_id))
    
    selected_team
    
}

team <- select_team(c(2988, 2028, 449))

team

ggplot(team, aes(x = match, y = driver_rating, color = team, group = team)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_point() +
    theme_bw() +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(team$match)) +
    labs(
        x = "Match",
        y = "Driver Rating",
        title = "Driver Rating")
```
